Reviews.Title: “Great service and very friendly to children too”
Reviews.Author: lklhols
Reviews.Content: recently stayed bernini bristol 3 children aged 6 12 14 connecting deluxe spacious convenient overlooking fountain piazza perfect location central rome amazing views rooftop bar gym easy breakfast selection fresh fruit cooked food regularly topped replaced service concierge hotel staff hotel excellent friendly children definitely recommend hotel hope return day
